title: League crashes my computer
body: Sometimes when i'm in a game the game will show the reconnecting box then a little bit after that my whole com freezes forcing me to restart my computer. Before this gives me a leaverbuster could someone tell me what to do?

replies.body: If you're getting a reconnect notice in game, then your network might be unstable and losing comms with the game server.  if no info is being transmitted, then it's possible for things to lock up.  As a first step, go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot.  Test it in a custom game, and let me know how it works out for you.
